page.title: 15SERVICES
page.content: {(E)SERVICES:BENET'S GARAGE-IN 1946, {MRS}ALLAN OWNED THE FILLING STATION.IT HAD TWO HAND PUMPS AND TWO ELECTRICAL.THE GARAGE WAS ONLY A SMALL ONE AND THE PRICE OF PETROL WAS ONE SHILLING,WHICH IS 5p NOW.THE HAND PUMP WORKED JUST BY TURNING THE HANDLE.MRS ALLAN ALSO OWNED A SHOP WHICH SOLD GROCERIES.CHEESE THEN COST 1 SHILLING AND NINE PENCE A POUND, WHICH IS 7\p NOW.SUGAR WAS 2d A BAG. TODAY THE VILLAGE HAS A POST OFFICE,BAKERS, BUTCHERS,NEWSAGENTS AND 4 PUBLIC HOUSES WITH PROVISION FOR FOOD.IT HAS A DOCTOR'S SURGERY.EASTERN ELECTRICITY,WHICH OWNED THE MILTON HALL UNTIL A FEW YEARS AGO,HAS IT'S OWN TRAINING CENTRE THERE. THE HALL IS NOW OWNED BY ONE OF THE HI TECH COMPUTER FIRMS.THERE IS A CHINESE TAKE-AWAY AND A FISH AND CHIP SHOP.
